author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three new taluks were carved out in Vellore and Tiruvannamalai districts on Saturday.

Video conferencing

Chief Minister J.Jayalalithaa has launched Kilpennathur taluk (carved out from Tiruvannamalai taluk), Nemili taluk (carved out from Arakkonam taluk) and Peranambut taluk (carved out from Gudiyatham taluk) through video conferencing from Chennai.

She also dedicated the Kilpennathur block development office building constructed at a cost of Rs.2 crore and Natrampalli (Vellore district) taluk office building constructed at a cost of Rs.2.02 crore.
title: Three taluks created in Tiruvannamalai, Vellore districts
